content: The Psalmist in Sickness Complains of Enemies and False Friends.
To the Chief Musician. A Psalm of David.
The  will save him in the day of trouble.
The  will protect him and keep him alive;
And he will be called blessed in the land;
You do not hand him over to the desire of his enemies.
The  will sustain  strengthen him on his sickbed;
In his illness, You will restore him to health.
